title: Body Text for Magazine
content: I really need some help selcting a body text font for my magazine. We are a food and wine magazine. We are using Berthold Baskerville now but i think it looks a bit old. Are there any good serif body fonts I may not be considering?
author: tidingsmag

comments.content:
Font Bureau is the place to start. They have lots serif type designe just for that purpose. Whitman (designed by Typophile regular Kent Lew) is one I want to use very soon:   
   
 [http://www.fontbureau.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080630/http:/www.fontbureau.com/)   
   
Check out Walburn, Worldwide and Goodchild, by Nick Shinn:   
 [http://www.shinntype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080630/http:/www.shinntype.com/)   
   
And I've long been intrigued by Kandal, from Mark Simonson:   
 [http://www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/kandal.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080630/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/kandal.html)
